subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] File just posted--Ben? Steven?
author: juli velazquez
full_text:
--0-1953702891-1201568349=:62100
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

Ann,   My tec is David who has a British Accent.  Joel's tec is Steven.  I hope this helps!
   
  Juli

lisbyfarrum <lisby@...> wrote:
          Did someone not just say they were told their technician was Ben? And
did someone not say their technician is Steven? Sometimes I feel like
I'm losing it.

I ask if my technician's name is David (which is also the name of
someone else's guide), which is info I got from Bruce. I hear,
"Steven." followed by, "It isn't." The I get the names "Nicholson
Lawson," something I can't understand, and then "Ben Wilson."
Nicholson is interesting to me because it is a family name. I'm not
sure if Nicholson Lawson is one name or it is a Nicholson and a
Lawson. For some reason, I got the feeling the name Ben Wilson was a
complete name.

Thoughts?

Ann
